title: Account hacked
body:
Got a problem with my support ticket,any help appreciated.I can't remember the original email i used to create my account but i have all the transactions that took place into that account since i use paypal.The support person that answered me says he cant help me even thought the only question i can't answer is that one even though i provided so much details on transactions that took place years ago..Any tips to get this sorted?(i only remember 3 of the first 5 champions i got)

The account am posting is the account that got hacked...I got a notification from the client that somebody logged from somewhere else,i tried to change my password but he had changed the email and then the password since i had never verified my email..the account never logged me out from the website so i am still logged in at the website.

replies.body: Our account recovery team will only recover an account if they're absolutely sure it's going back to the original owner.  Even if you weren't able to the first time, its' totally fine to try again.  Make sure to fill out an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) to put in as much detail as you can, even anything extra you can think of.  The questions asked are supplements towards helping you.  We'll reply back and continue working with you individually.
Bump so this guy gets helped.
